Title: The Appointment of an External Market Operator
Description: Rochdale Council invites tenders from individuals or organisations interested in the implementation, operation and management of Rochdale Market.  Whilst experience of market management and operation is anticipated, the Council will consider proposals from individuals or organisations with other complementary experience.  Experience should demonstrate initiative and new ways of thinking, together with a successful track record in commercial and town centre regeneration activities.

Title: Quotation for the design and investment options for the redevelopment of Sandwell Council's Indoor Market in West Bromwich with detailed options appraisal. - AWARD
Description: Sandwell Council has been operating an indoor market of approximately 35,000 sq.ft. in the Kings Square shopping centre in West Bromwich since it was built in 1973, which has been trading profitably since then.  Whilst there have been some minor maintenance works, including electrical rewiring, new floor surfaces, painting and the creation of a new entrance, the building has remained substantially unchanged since it was opened to the public.   The Council owns the freehold.
